alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Harrison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 3:29AM EDT until May 09 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Harrison County in south central Indiana... South central Floyd County in south central Indiana... Central Jefferson County in central Kentucky... North central Bullitt County in central Kentucky... * Until 400 AM EDT. * At 329 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pleasure Ridge Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Louisville, Jeffersonville, New Albany, Jeffersontown, St. Matthews, Shively, Lyndon, Hurstbourne, Graymoor-Devondale and Windy Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
